name: Go To Hell (?)
description:
Topic: Convince the poor souls of dead people to follow the seven heavenly virtues instead of the 7 deadly sins!

How to play: Select and upgrade your virtue levels to make sure, that they are more attractive compared to the deadly sins. Each upgrade gives passive soul points and additional points, if converted souls go to heaven. But be careful - the devil takes care of his sins, too...

How to win: Make sure, that heaven attracts more souls, reaches a score of 1.000 and the last soul enters heaven... however, the devil plays unfair and if he reaches 1.000 points too before the last soul reaches heaven's gate, it's over...

Game: Code Enjoyer and TestOneDev

Textures: ambientcg.com

Music: Cloud9 by Podington Bear at freemusicarchive.org

Waterfall Sound: Nox_Sound at freesound.org

Other Sounds: Samulis at freesound.org

Low Poly Hand: ZOSK Studios at sketchfab.com

Environment Models: Quaternius.com

Lean Pool Asset: Carlos Wilkes

UltEvents Asset: Kybernetik

DoTween Free Asset: Demigiant

Open Source: GitHub Repo

Submission for the GameDevTV Jam 2022 (Theme: Death is only the beginning)
